summary: This is an email chain from April 5, 2021, forwarding a January 15, 2021 email. The correspondence discusses a U.S. Attorney's Office (likely SDNY) plan to contact Jeffrey Epstein's estate to follow up on obtaining photos and to serve a subpoena for passenger manifests from Epstein's planes.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE' and 'Epstein'; his estate is being contacted by prosecutors for photos and passenger manifests from his planes.

events.title: Prosecutors plan contact with Epstein estate
events.description: An email outlines a plan for a prosecutor to contact Jeffrey Epstein's estate to follow up on an agreement to provide photos and to flag an intent to subpoena passenger manifests from Epstein's planes.

events.title: Forward of estate contact plan
events.description: The January 15, 2021 email regarding contacting Epstein's estate is forwarded to another recipient, indicating ongoing legal efforts.

keyFacts: As of January 2021, U.S. prosecutors were planning to contact Jeffrey Epstein's estate to obtain photos.
Prosecutors also planned to subpoena Epstein's estate for passenger manifests from his planes.
The email indicates ongoing investigative efforts related to Epstein's activities well after his death in 2019.
